name: market for electrolyte, for Li-ion battery | electrolyte, for Li-ion battery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24921/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'electrolyte, for Li-ion battery', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'electrolyte, for Li-ion battery',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  electrolyte, for Li-ion battery', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products
